TopicTitle: Oh it will be fine.....no need to double check the couplers

Articles.Content:
Got all my habitats hooked up to cargo racks, prepping to mount on boosters.

Everything looked fine, couplers all locked in and solid, but the bottom plate un-tweakscaled itself.....which is bad

soon after that jerk gravity kicked in, prob should have finished inspections

crap

Ahh, exploding on the launchpad, the universal KSP experience!

No game does it better. Never has repeated failures been so entertaing.
